Summary: Round star like object moving, then hovering, amber to orange in color.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in West Valley City
There were 2 other sightings in West Valley City on or around March 13th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMarch 13th, 2009, I spotted one star like object moving from south to north. The color was amber to orange in color. It was on the west side of the valley. It passed my position in the valley and stopped. It was a little hazy out in spots. It was lost out of my view due to the trees in the backyard as it stopped, but I could not find it. As the day before they seem to light up as they move and get dim when they decide to stop and hover for a while. It was about 8:30pm? I stayed out to about 9:30 and didn���t see anything else.
